mapper.update: update sys_param set param_value = #{paramValue,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, param_desc = #{paramDesc,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, create_date = #{createDate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, create_user = #{createUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, update_date = #{updateDate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, update_time = #{updateTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, update_user = #{updateUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, time_stamp = #{timeStamp,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, rec_stat = #{recStat,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where param_type = #{paramType,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and param_code = #{paramCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select: select param_type, param_code, param_value, param_desc, create_date, create_time, create_user, update_date, update_time, update_user, time_stamp, rec_stat from sys_param
